guiTeacher.interfaces

Interface Dragable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Visible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Accordion, FullFunctionPane, ScrollableDragablePane, SearchBox, SimpleTable, TextBox, TextField

    public interface Dragable
extends Visible
    A visible object that can be dragged. Note that a Draggable does not have any effect if it is not within a FullFunctionScreen
    Author:
    bnockles
